original_text: Their children that were left after them in the land, whom the children of Israel also were not able utterly to destroy, upon those did Solomon levy a tribute of bondservice unto this day.
korean_text: 곧 이스라엘 자손이 다 멸하지 못하므로 그 땅에 남아 있는 그들의 자손들을 솔로몬이 노예로 역군을 삼아 오늘까지 이르렀으되

sentences.original_text: Their children that were left after them in the land
sentences.korean_translation: 그 땅에 그들 후에 남은 그들의 자손들은

sentences.original_text: whom the children of Israel also were not able utterly to destroy
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 자손들이 완전히 멸하지 못했던 자들을

sentences.original_text: upon those did Solomon levy a tribute of bondservice
